snippet: A stream of lava has hit the first home in a rural Hawaii town, which has been watching the slow-moving flow for months, and set it on fire Monday.
abstract: Stream of lava hits the first home in a rural Hawaii town on the Big Island, which has been watching the slow-moving flow for months, and sets it on fire.
lead_paragraph: A stream of lava has hit the first home in a rural Hawaii town, which has been watching the slow-moving flow for months, and set it on fire Monday.
